ygData.subject: Re: Oh And Also
ygData.msgSnippet: Ak Anon seems to me to have all the enchantment spells, except the ones either not in game. and it does not have the enchant metal spells ... From: HiFi Review
ygData.messageBody:
Ak'Anon seems to me to have all the enchantment spells, except the ones
either not in game. and it does not have the enchant metal spells

From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>

Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Oh And Also
